Very good audio and video quality. The color is not as sharp as I would expect from a BluRay rip but the embedded subtitles more than make up for it. Thank you uploader.

To add to my previous post...

The embedded subs are for the non-English speaking language only. For example, in the third scene (with the doctor), the entire dialogue is in German. This is the only .torrent I found with embedded (hardcoded) non-English dialogue.
